content:
Representatives of a company that provides window glazing services near Kursk and Bryansk, observing the situation around the attack by an unknown drone on the FSB building in Belgorod, begin to actively offer their services to potential customers.

About thisinformsDefence Intelligence of Ukraine.

The persistent representative of the company noted that it would call tomorrow, because I am sure that the windows and doors are briefly.

  • "Watch the news?" Or how did you get into the border control of the FSB? Do not watch the news. Be careful from now on. All the best, I'll pick it up tomorrow. Till tomorrow".
  • “The point here is not that you have windows and doors, everyone has them. But the fact is whether they are whole for a long time. Do you understand what I'm talking about? "

GUR MOU also reminded that for every military crime committed against Ukraine, there will be a fair payment.

As reported by the Armyinform, in military intelligence told aboutConsequences of explosions at an oil refinery in Russia.
title: "It's not that you have windows and doors, it's how long are they intact?"
description: The Main Directorate of Intelligence of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine informs about it. A persistent representative ...
author: Army Inform
